show me a married woman, who loves her husband, and ill show you a woman who will attack those that threaten her marriage. Add to that the constant attacks from the Republicans and you have even more of a reason. It's not hypocritical to protect your own and still be against sexual harassment. I don't remember Billbeing accused of assault, harassment yes, but I don't remember accusations of assault. If they happened then they should have been reported to the police when they happened not years later when he became President.
